28.1.hd_quote: The desire to be effective manifested in the application of energy to detail.
28.1.behavioral_axis: Builds a base of details before committing to any struggle.
28.1.shadow_axis: Analysis without action; over-prepping to avoid real stakes.

28.2.behavioral_axis: May ally with questionable forces to win the struggle.
28.2.shadow_axis: Selling out core values; depression after hollow victories.

28.3.behavioral_axis: Pushes edges to learn what is worth the fight.
28.3.shadow_axis: Rationalizing gambles; failure cycles without wisdom.

28.4.hd_quote: The ability through whatever means to keep one's grip.
28.4.behavioral_axis: Locks onto a cause and refuses to let go.

28.5.behavioral_axis: Stirs others into the game to test lifeâ€™s worth.

28.6.hd_quote: Sacrifice rather than capitulation to the law of deterioration.
28.6.behavioral_axis: Goes all the way to prove life is worthwhile.
